name: Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra
description:
The Hidden Orchestra is on tour!
They're cute. They're chibi. They're talented. But, they're shy!

They are trapped in ice! in sand! Even in other planets!

.

In this hidden object game you will need to find hidden musician cats that are embarassed to play their music.

For every cat you find, you will hear a different musical instrument sound.

Make your own music!

.
